name: m3_test

args.name: submodel
args.description: The model as a function of dN/dS

args.name: posP
args.description: The fraction of positively selected sites

args.name: posW
args.description: The dN/dS value for positively selected sites

args.name: posSelection
args.description: The model selector: 1 if positive selection, 0 if not

args.name: n
args.description: The number of omega categories, if not specified

description: This model performs a Bayesian test of positive selection using a modified M3 model.  The M3 model is extended with an extra category of sites that is either neutral (posSelection=0) or positively-selected (posSelection=1).  The posterior probability that posSelection=1 is posterior probability for positive selection.
